It is such a pleasure to work with Tom. He is able to build a real and palatable energy as he leads our company. He is an expert at forming a dynamic and cohesive leadership team. Tom captains his team to instill a thoughtful corporate vision across the organization while building and maintaining a culture that celebrates the employee and each individual's contribution and success.
